data.title: Kyle Korver is 6th in all-time 3s made (2,450) and 10th in 3PT% (42.87%). He had a 20-point checklist that he focused on to help himself by...
data.meta_description:
formshooting on February 5, 2024: "Kyle Korver is 6th in all-time 3s made (2,450) and 10th in 3PT% (42.87%). He had a 20-point checklist that he focused on to help himself by isolating individual movements — mentally and physically because if he doesn’t know what’s wrong with his shot he cannot correct it

“I’m not going to check every single one of them every time,” Korver said. “There’s a certain point, a certain feel I’m trying to get to every day. Some things, you do more naturally. Some things, I have to think about them. As I’m shooting, I have this list in the back of my head, and I know I’m not doing one or two of them. Once I feel I get all 20 of them clicking, then I’m going to have natural rhythm in my shot”".
